oai_dc:dc.dc:title: French. Ashley S. Johnson letter, August 20, 1920.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Ashley Sidney Johnson, Founder and President, Johnson Bible College, Kimberlin Heights, TN, to Mrs. Lucy (corrected to Lizzie) Crozier French. August 20, 1920. "You have fought nobly, victory crowns you..." Lizzie Crozier French Papers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Correspondence;
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ashley Sidney Johnson
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: C.M. McClung Historical Collection, Knox County Public Library
